entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:38 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries at times heavy changing to flurries at times heavy and ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
